phrases: I am sure I erased his Quirk.
That means he is just that strong.
He is as strong as All Might...
We were all, even the teachers...
I passed young Iida on my way...
Good grief, it really makes me angry.
Thinking about how frightening it must have been for the children...
And how hard my juniors fought...
It is my first time seeing him in person!
If we kill that, we will
I am leaving Aizawa to you.
He hit me as he was saving them...
It is the violence of a government official.
I cannot follow him with my eyes.
But not as fast as I thought he would be.
I guess it is true, after all...
That brain villain took One Fo
He took a punch that did not break my arm, but he did not even twitch.
It seriously has no effect at all, huh?!
It does not work on his face, either, huh?
It does not work because of shock absorption.
In order to cause damage to Nomu...
Whether he would let you do that or not is a different issue, though.
Thanks for telling me all that!
If that is true, then it is easier for me!
Those guys are underestimating All Might too much!
How did he make a suplex look like an explosion?!
All Might's on a whole nother level!
Even though he is a rookie teacher who cannot teach without looking at his notes.
It is possible they have a way to kill him...
Even so, there is nothing we can do right now.
Instead, if anyone gets held hostage, we would be worse than in the way.
Rather than wondering about the villains...
Every day on my way to school, I read the hero news in real time.
When they were talking about how All Might was not here...
It must have been because he would used too much of his power!
I am the only one who knows.
It is an injury I got from an enemy's attack five years ago.
Half of my respiratory organs were destroyed...
I have become emaciated from repeated surgeries and the aftereffects.
Right now, I can only work as a hero...
I will save people with a smile!
The Symbol of Peace cannot be daunted by evil.
I smile to show the pressure of heroes...
I am the only one who knows!
Were you trying to keep him from moving by sticking him deep in the concrete?
You will not be able to stop him like that.
Because Nomu is as strong as you are.
I do not want blood and guts overflowing within me...
You are too fast to see with the human eye.
And then... when your body is halfway in, to close the gate...
Trade places with me carrying Mr. Aizawa.
There are still tons of things...
Move, you are in the way, Deku!
All I heard was that you all are here to kill All Might.
He controlled it so that the ice stopped just before it reached me.
Thanks to that, his grip loosened!
I did not get to show off!
Stop acting so stuck-up, foggy nobody!
The Symbol of Peace cannot be killed by the likes of you.
Leave this to them, let us hurry!
When the other teachers get here... get to a safe place...
our exit and entrance, has been overcome.
You are just what I thought you would be.
Only certain parts of you can turn into a misty warp gate.
The fog gate covered your actual body, right?
If you were completely made of mist and physical attacks could not touch you,
then you would not have said that is dangerous.
If I feel like you are moving suspiciously,
then I will blow you up!
His behavior is not very hero-like...
In addition to capturing them, they are almost all uninjured.
They make the League of Villains look bad.
His Quirk was not shock absorption?
I did not say that was all he had.
Nomu has been modified to take you at 100.
He is a super-efficient human sandbag.
First, we need to get our gate back.
Do you not know how to hold back?
It was to rescue my companions.
He was about to punch me with everything he had, you know.
Violence for the sake of others makes it admirable.
I am angry at this world that categorizes the same violent acts as heroic or villainous...
What with this Symbol of Peace?
You are just a device to repress violence.
The world will know this, once we kill you!
The eyes of white-collar criminals like you burn silently.
You just want to enjoy this yourself, do not you, you liar?!
He is already figured me out?
Kacchan already exposed the fog's weakness!
You would have been in trouble if I had not done anything earlier, right?
That was a different story, young Todoroki.
Just watch as a pro gives it everything he is got.
I will deal with the children.
It is true that I barely have a minute left.
My power has been declining faster than I expected!
Now, let us clear this and go home.
Hey, we have got to do this after all!
Hey, you talked about his shock absorption yourself earlier, did not you?
If your Quirk is not shock nullification but shock absorption...
If you can withstand me at 100...
He is bleeding... while giving it his all...!
That was a villain up there just now, was not it?
There is no one else who can do something so amazing!
It is like he nullified the shock absorption.
Does this mean he rushed at him so fast he could not regenerate?
Is this... the world of pros...?
In my prime... five hits would have been enough.
But it took more than 300 hits.
I am sure... we would all like to end this as soon as possible.
The members of this class will become strong heroes!
Next time, In Each of Our Hearts!
Now, yell out toward that sunset!
He Quickly Resolved Three Cases This Morning
Next time: In Each of Our Hearts
